SEA failover manually

  • There are times when network outages occur where layer2 stays up but layer3 fails, like today 8/4/2014 at around 2:15 PM.
  • To failover a SEA interface, login to the VIOS server whose SEA is primary at this time and designate it's role to standby
    sudo chdev -l entX -a ha_mode=standby

    entX is the SEA adapter name

  • To failback, 
    sudo chdev -l entX -a ha_mode=auto
  • To check
    sudo entstat -d ent6 | grep -e "  Priority" -e "Virtual Adapter" -e "  State:" -e "High Availability Mode"
